comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: Wildcard block should not be placed on Cloudflare R2 domain
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.3.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://pub-*.r2.dev

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard Japanese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Cloudflare Public R2.dev Bucket URL should not be blocked. Unless there is any specific domain, you should not block with a wildcard.

- https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/JapaneseFilter/sections/general_url.txt#L97

Please remove this entry. Any issues with Cloudflare, should be reported to https://abuse.cloudflare.com/.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
It's related to this bug - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/tsurlfilter/issues/130 and cuased by this rule:
```adblock

Появляется видео реклама после которой вылазит окно, которое приложил к обращению. Пытался сделать скриншот во время проигрыша рекламы. Но при любой попытке что-либо нажать, сделать свайп - телефон переходит по ссылке на Гугл-плей рекламированной игры. Так что сделал только скриншот окна после рекламы. Готов предоставить дополнительную информацию, если необходима Username: `@RomchikL` ### Screenshots

comment.body:
К сожалению, реклама снова появляется. Уточню, что после выигрыша у меня еще ни разу не вылезла, после проигрыша - через раз. Скорее вылазит спустя некоторое время простоя. Не играл сутки-двое, играешь, проиграл - вылезла, но если еще раз проиграть - не замечал.
Реклама всегда одинаковая - это видео, видимо, их другой игры - нарды. Идет видеоролик. При попытке куда-либо нажать/свайпнуть - сразу переход в гугл плей на эту игру ([ссылка](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ahoygames.backgammon)).

- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

4.3.53

Website or app doesn't work properly

Chrome

Desktop

AdGuard Base filter

AdGuard Japanese filter

### Add your comment and screenshots

Cloudflare Public R2.dev Bucket URL should not be blocked. Unless there is any specific domain, you should not block with a wildcard.

- https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/JapaneseFilter/sections/general_url.txt#L97

Please remove this entry. Any issues with Cloudflare, should be reported to https://abuse.cloudflare.com/.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Появляется видео реклама после которой вылазит окно, которое приложил к обращению. Пытался сделать скриншот во время проигрыша рекламы. Но при любой попытке что-либо нажать, сделать свайп - телефон переходит по ссылке на Гугл-плей рекламированной игры. Так что сделал только скриншот окна после рекламы. Готов предоставить дополнительную информацию, если необходима Username: `@RomchikL` ### Screenshots
